EmailTemplate.description: This Email would go out when a Departure City is changed for a TAD Order Record.
EmailTemplate.name: Departure City Change Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Departure City has now been changed.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Order_Communication_POE__c.ordexp_Purchaser_First_Name__c},
Your request for Departure City change has now been taken care of. We will get back to you shortly.
We're here to help you. If you have any questions, please visit our Support Page. Or call us on 1300 861 736.
Regards, The TripADeal Team
